summary: A highly adaptable full-stack developer with a record of delivering professional software and problem solving at every level of the stack. Experienced in maintaining complex codebases and architecting projects from the ground up. Proficient in handling and analysing datasets from physics career.

education.subject: Cond. Matter Physics
departments: Centre for Science at Extreme Conditions
Year abroad: Uni. of Auckland, NZ

experience.summary: Cydar are a medical imaging startup; 3D deformation models of the heart are generated from CT scans, overlaid onto xray video streams and updated in real time to guide surgical operations.

notes.note: Delivered new surgical planning software from concept. Designed and architected frontend codebase, proposed and implemented new coding standards, managed interface layer between python and c++ backend code. Contributed an original algorithm to handle percentage based zoom on 3D model.
Worked alone to set up new CI pipeline for the In Theatre GUI application; automated complex integration tests within containerised web-driver improving reliability and 100% decrease in CI run time.
Developed a custom test harness to benchmark algorithmic identification of ROIs in CT scans, aiding in optimising the 2D/3D algorithmic registration times during surgery.
Developed a Github-Slackbot to inform when PR merge conflicts arise from upstream changes - helped optimise the software release cycle and ease bottlenecks in the QA queue.
Time-critical triaging of bugs reported by users. Debugging backend code to identify source of issues, patching live servers where necessary.

Rebuilt the entire frontend for the 'ITG', a highly complex, state dependent browser application used by surgeons during operations. A solo project which demonstrates my ability to digest an unfamiliar codebase, identify issues and produce a robust, reactive and extensible application.
Enhanced backend services - Improved DICOM image sorting algorithm to ensure correct stacking order. Deployed test cloud to test interaction with other micro-services.

experience.summary: Scott Logic are a highly respected software consultancy. During my time here I gained formal training and worked as part of a large team developing scalable codebases at the enterprise level.

notes.note: Worked from POC to production on a Single Sign-On (SSO) application for the Scottish Government. Focused on the backend implementing PKCE authentication flow to meet stringent security requirements.
Delivered CI/CD training to graduates; automated build and deployment of application using infrastructure as code.
Presenting demos regularly for different groups of clients, modifying level of presentation to suit audience knowledge.
Rapidly developed and deployed working prototype with PKCE authentication server for SSO project.
Learned to value teamwork collaborating with large group of graduates on internal project.
Mentoring PhD students within a reputable high-pressure science research group.
Planning and overseeing multi-day experiential campaigns, collecting data at international facilities with specialised instrumentation.
Strong writing ability demonstrated through publications as the first author in high-impact journals.
Developed excellent public speaking skills by delivering presentations to large audiences at international conferences.

projects.name: Portfolio site
projects.description: Personal portfolio using modern JavaScript framework to highlight coding projects and other hobbies. Uses SSR and features several fun widgets including a mini 2D physics engine and a library for drawing complex shapes in the HTML canvas.

projects.name: In Theatre GUI - Cydar Medical
projects.description: Tasked with rebuilding the entire frontend for real time surgical guidance application; implemnting new UX design using a brand new frontend framework to replace pure JS. Had to fully read and understand the existing application which used Redux to manage complex state dependent transitions, and websockets to send and recieve processed data from cloud based GPUs severs. A key challenge was figuring out how to expose and connect the Redux store to the Svelte store so Svelte components could subscribe to state changes. I architected and structured the entire JS/TS component library and rebuilt the product from the ground up. The result is a highly extensible, readable and testable codebase; the application is a medical device and is used by surgeons during operations to save lives.

projects.name: Browser based D&D Initiative Tracker
projects.description: App designed to help manage running a game of Dungeons & Dragons - part of a full tool-suite that I am actively developing. An entirely static, but feature-rich application with data persistence (via local storage), a visual historical action log and an attractive UI.

projects.name: Free Website with CMS
projects.description: Helped a small dance company from Uganda save money by building a free website, with content and a timetable that could be easily managed with minimal computer literacy. The website is hosted  on Github Pages and utilizes Netlify for user-authenticated content management.

projects.name: Spotify CLI
projects.description: Bash scripted Command-line Interface leveraging the Spotify Dev API to play and manage songs and playlists.

projects.name: Full-Stack Wedding App
projects.description: A MERN stack app created entirely from scratch, launched and deployed as microservices with security in mind, using a reverse proxy to orchestrate traffic. Backend authentication server validates user and authorizes client session via cookies. Enables wedding to guests manage meal choices, report arrival dates, find their seats and access the itinerary. "Wapp" effectively aided us in organising and managing our wedding.

projects.name: Wizard Grenade 2D Game
projects.description: First major project undertaken to learn Object-Oriented Programming and implement design patterns. Took time to create a well-crafted and extensible game library from scratch, to build a fully functional local multiplayer from a simple render loop - featuring a custom physics engine, unique artwork and music.

publications.title: Structural phase transitions in yttrium up to 183 GPa
Intense Reactivity in Sulfur-Hydrogen Mixtures at High Pressure under X-ray Irradiation
publications.journal: The Journal of Physical Chemistry Letters

publications.title: Synthesis and stability of hydrogen selenide compounds at high pressure
